mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_id, user_password, authority, registered_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, 2, current_timestamp)
INSERT INTO personal_info (name, birth, phone, email, user_no) VALUES (#{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userNo})
mapper.select: SELECT user_info.user_no AS userNo, user_info.user_id AS userId, user_info.user_password AS userPw, personal_info.name AS userName, personal_info.birth AS userBirth, personal_info.phone AS userPhone, personal_info.email AS userEmail, user_info.authority AS userAuth, user_info.registered_date AS appendDate FROM user_info JOIN personal_info ON user_info.user_no = personal_info.user_no WHERE user_info.user_id = #{userId} AND user_info.user_password = #{userPw}
